summary: This is a forwarded email chain from August 12, 2019, regarding documentation, sent to a Federal Bureau of Prisons Correctional Service Administrator at the Northeast Regional Office. The content is minimal, consisting primarily of administrative apologies and forwarding notes.

persons.name: Val Stlinalf
persons.context: Appears as the recipient of the forwarded email, holding an administrative position within the Federal Bureau of Prisons Northeast Regional Office.

events.title: Email Correspondence Regarding Documentation
events.description: An email is forwarded to Correctional Service Administrator Val Stlinalf, with an apology for a previous omission in recipient list and an offer to provide further assistance.

keyFacts: The document is a forwarded email dated August 12, 2019, sent to a Bureau of Prisons administrator.
The primary content is an administrative apology for not including the recipient on a prior email.
The document identifier 'EFTA00142385' is referenced within the email text.
